participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and creative, always seeking new adventures.
participant_1.background: The appalachian trail is my favorite. I work in marketing. I like folk music. My hiking boots are pink.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Caring and passionate about family, with a love for sweets.
participant_2.background: I really like cake and do not prefer vegetables. I am almost finished with my degree. I have one sister and a niece and nephew. I am 49, male and live in Dublin, Ireland. I take care of my mother and father.

content.text: What's your favorite kind of music?
I like folk music.
Oh, that's nice! I like folk music too. What are some of your favorite bands?
I like The Avett Brothers and The Wood Brothers.
I've heard of The Avett Brothers, but I haven't heard of The Wood Brothers. I'll have to check them out.
They're a really good band. What do you do for a living?
I work in marketing.
Oh, that sounds interesting. Do you enjoy it?
I do, it's a lot of fun.
What's your favorite part of it?
I like getting to work with different people and coming up with creative ideas.
That sounds like a great job.
Yeah, it is.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to hike, I like to go to concerts, and I like to read.
That's cool. I like to hike too, I also like to play video games and watch movies.
Nice, what kind of movies do you like to watch?
I like to watch action movies, comedies, and horror movies.
Nice, I like to watch those kinds of movies too.
We should watch a movie together sometime.
That would be fun
